mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.url, p.icon, p.parent, p.state, r.roleName FROM t_system_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.userId LEFT JOIN t_system_role r ON r.id = ur.roleId LEFT JOIN t_role_privilege rp ON r.id = rp.roleId LEFT JOIN t_system_privilege p ON p.id = rp.privilegeId WHERE u.username = #{q.userName}
